question: Who won Silver at Dubai World Badminton Superseries Finals?
explanation: Top Indian shuttler P V Sindhu won the Silver medal in women's singles summit clash of the Dubai World Super Series Final in Dubai. She went down fighting against World No. 2 Akane Yamaguchi of Japan. In the prestigious season-ending tournament finale, Sindhu lost in three games, 21-15 12-21 19-21, to Yamaguchi in the final.
